name: 2 Minutes to Escape (Lord_Coconut)
description:
In this game you have to escape from your exploding space rocket in 2 minutes.

This game was made for the 2020 united game jam.

This is my first game, so I am a beginner.

Background music: 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Fesliyan Studios music https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
